alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Chemung and southeastern Steuben Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 333 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coopers Plains, or near Corning, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elmira, Corning, Southport, Big Flats, Horseheads, Elmira Heights, Campbell, Painted Post, Hornby and South Corning. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 41 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
